content.rendered:
[vc_row el_class=”overflow”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1573234333729{margin-top: 30px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Overcoming Barriers and Engaging Various Client Personas

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1516172452243{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}” el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron sm-hide”]Trying to get your clients to adopt marketing automation? Find out what Vivid Image, a SharpSpring partner, does to effectively pitch marketing automation to clients.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”In this first issue of Agency Perspectives you’ll learn:” font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”sm-hide” css=”.vc_custom_1516172535979{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1516172467685{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}” el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron sm-hide”]

  • The Barriers to Marketing Automation & How to Overcome Them
  • Effective Approaches for Different Types of Marketers
  • The Statistics Behind Automation and the Marketers Who Use It

[/vc_column_text]

Steve Gasser

Vivid Image

``At the end of the day, understanding your client is the key to selling automation and getting the yes you desire.``

What is Agency Perspectives?
[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1515996495260{padding-right: 5em !important;}” el_class=”sm-hide”]Agency Perspectives lets you hear directly from other agencies about how they are using marketing automation to create higher value relationships, build monthly recurring revenue, and prove value to clients. It’s available exclusively from SharpSpring. Contact us if you’d like to share your expertise as an author.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”m-t-minus-25-percent” offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_column_text]

I've got to read it:


Do you work at a marketing agency?*
yesno

Sign up for a live demo of SharpSpring?*
YesNo

We’re committed to keeping your info safe. Privacy Policy

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
